title: VTS Kit Angular Schematic
description: Creates a new, generic enum definition in the given or default project.

shared.description: Specifies whether to create enum in shared directory (true / false).

x-prompt.message: Do you want to create enum in 'shared' directory? (--shared)

path.description: The path at which to create the enum, relative to 'shared' or 'libs' folder.
path.x-prompt: Where to create new enum, relative to 'shared' or 'libs' folder? (--path)

name.description: The name of the new enum.
name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use for the enum? (--name)

type.description: Adds a developer-defined type to the filename, in the format "name.type.ts".
